column2: FAO: Ata mafaranga abonetse indege zo kurwanya inzige zirahagarara
column3: Ishami rya ONU rikurikirana uburimyi n'ivyo kurya kw'isi FAO riragabisha ko indege zaryo zose zafasha mu kurwanya inzige zongeye gutera muri Afrika y'ubuseruko zishobora kudasubira gukora hamwe ritoronka amafaranga angana na miriyoni 38 z'ama dolari ($38 million). Izo nzige zitema zigatongora imirima zongeye gutera muri Ethiopia, Kenya na Somalia aho zigeramiye imibereho y'abarimyi n'abarozi basanzwe bahanzwe n'ingaruka z'izikiza ca Covid-19 n'imyuzure muri ako karere. Ku mwihwezo wa vuba, FAO isanga izo nzige zimaze gutera mu ntara 11  muri Kenya kandi ko ziriko zitera zija mu ntara zo kw'ibahari z'ico gihugu hamwe no muri Tanzania. Zimaze kwonona kandi imirima muri Ethiopia na Somalia uyu mwaka. Ribaye irya  gatatu  muri aka karere hatera inzige mu kiringo c'umwaka umwe. Inzige zateye: Aho ziva, ibyo zangiza, uko zirwanywa...ibyo ukeneye kumenya Icyorezo cy'inzige cyageze muri Uganda na Tanzania FAO iragabisha ko hagiye kuba ikindi gitero c'inzige Izo nzige nshasha zafashijwe gushwara akarere n'igihuhusi Gati  catumye mu minsi mike hagwa imvura ingana n'iyoguye mu kiringo c'imyaka ibiri. Vyatumye inzige zoroherwa mu kugwirirana. Umuhuzabikorwa w'ibikorwa vyihuta muri FAO muri Somalia, Ezana Kassa, avuga ati: "Ingaruka n'uko uburimyi n'ubworozi bihungabana cane mu gihugu kidasanganywe amaragamo mu vyerekeye ivyo kurya'' Iryo shami rya ONU rivuga ko gupompa imiti mu kirere no hasi , vyakozwe kuva izo nzige ziteye ubwa mbere mu kwezi kwa mbere mu 2020, vyari vyatumye hakizwa ibitegwa n'ibitungwa biciye amafaranga aharugwa muri miriyaridi 1.2 z'ama dolari. "Aho inzige zaheruka gutera ku rugero rusa n'uru rw'ubu, mu karere ka Sahel, vyasavye imyaka ibiri n'amafaranga arenga miriyoni 500 z'ama dolari kugira zishobore gutuzwa. Iki gitero kirakomeye gusumba, ariko ibihugu vy'a Afrika y'ubuseruko bisa n'ibizogitsinda-gusa ni bitange amafaranga y'igitoro kugira indege zigume zikora'',  bivugwa n'icegera c'umuyobozi mukuru wa FAO Laurent Thomas.

column2: Pierre Buyoya na bagenziwe bavuga iki ku munyororo wo guherayo baciriwe?
column3: Petero Buyoya na bagenziwe baherutse kwagirwa n'icaha co kugandagura umukuru w'igihugu Melchior Ndadaye bariyamiriza urubanza rwaciwe na sentare y'u Burundi. Itangazo Bwana Buyoya wenyene yarungikiye BBC rivuga ko abafatiwe ibi bihano bavuga ko bafise uburenganzira bwo kwungururiza mu masentare yo mu gihugu canke mpuzamakungu. Sentare ntahinyuzwa mu Burundi yakatiye Bwana Buyoya - yatwaye u Burundi ubugira kabiri (1987 - 1993 na 1996 - 2003) - hamwe n'abandi bantu 15 umunyororo wo guherayo. Abandi batatu baciriwe gupfungwa imyaka 20 nayo umwe yambitswe izera. Abaciriwe urubanza bose hamwe ni 20 - benshi bahoze ari abasirikare bakuru - bane (4) muri bo ni bo basanzwe bapfunze uwundi yahora yidegemvya mu Burundi, abandi bose baba hanze. Iri tangazo rivuga ko uru rubanza rufise imvo za politiki "na rirya rwatanguye inyuma y'indyane za politike zadutse mu 2015". Rivuga ko urubanza rwabo "rwatanguye mu gihe igihugu cari mu ndyane zishingiye ku kiringo ca gatatu ca Perezida Pierre Nkurunziza cari giteye kubiri n'ibwirizwashingiro". Bavuga ko intumbero y'uru rubanza "kwari ukurondera kwiyegereza abanyagihugu ku mvo za politike n'ubwoko, bitegurira amatora aheruka ya 2020". Bavuga kandi ko uru rubanza rwaciwe kugira ngo "bace imitima abanyagihugu mu gihe bwaca bibuka igandagurwa rya Perezida Melchior Ndadaye", igikorwa cabaye uyu munsi ku wa gatatu. Uru rubanza rwarigeze gutanguzwa mu mpera za 1998, ariko hafatwa abo benshi bavuze ko bari abantu bato bato cane batari kuba ari bo bateguye igandagurwa ry'umukuru w'igihugu. Mu 2019 Leta yasohoye imitahe yo gufata abari abasirikare bakomakomeye hamwe na Bwana Pierre Buyoya, intumwa y'ishirahamwe ry'ubumwe bwa Afrika mu karere ka Sahel, ubu uba muri Mali. Aba bipfuzwa n'ubutungane ntibigeze bafatwa n'igipolisi mpuzamakungu ngo bashikirizwe u Burundi, ntibizwi neza niba icemezo gishasha ca sentare kizotuma bafatwa. Iyi sentare yategetse kandi ko bose hamwe bishura hafi imiliyaridi 103 z'amafranga y'u Burundi, ku bushake bwabo canke ku nguvu. Aba baciriwe urubanza bavuga ko kuva mu ntango batigeze bahabwa uburenganzira bwo guserukirwa na rirya basanzwe "baba hanze kubera imvo z'umutekano wabo". Bavuga ko abashikirizwamanza mpuzamakungu babo "leta yabigije inyuma ibima impusha zo kwinjira mu Burundi kugira ngo bababuranire". Itangazo ryabo rivuga ko urwo ari urubanza ruteye kubiri n'amategeko.

column2: Jus za pomme zikorwa na Ceres zisabwa kuvanwa mw'icuruzwa
column3: Umutobe (jus/juice)  wa pomme (apple) ukorwa na kompanyi yo muri Africa y'Epfo Ceres vyasabwe ko uvanwa mw'icuruzwa  mu bihugu indwi vyo muri Afrika vyawuranguye kubera ufise urugero runini rwa patulin  ishobora gutera kudahwa no gusesemwa. Patulin n'ubumara buterwa n'ifira ry'ubwoko butandukanye  usanga mu ma pommes canke mu bikozwe mu ma pommes. Ibipimo vyo muri laboratoire  vyerekanye ko imitobe ya Ceres irimwo patulin ku rugero ruri hejuru cane y'urwemewe rwa microgrammes 50 kuri ritiro imwe. Iyo mitobe igurishwa muri Kenya, RDC (Congo Kinshasa), Zambia, Zimbabwe, Uganda, Seychelles n'izinga rya Maurice. Ariko no mu bihugu bibanyi vy'ivyo vyaranguye  iyo mitobe ishobora kuba ishikayo. Urwego rw'isoko rusangi rw'ibihugu vyo muri Afrika y'Ubuseruko n'iy'ubumanuko (Comesa)  rwahimirije abaguzi gusubiza imitekero yose ifise amatariki yo hagati ya 14 na 30 ukwezi kwa gatandatu 2021.

column2: Burundi - Rwanda: Umushikiranganji wo kwivuna abansi yashikanye ubutumwa bwa Kagame kuri Ndayishimiye
column3: Intumwa zidasanzwe z'Urwanda zirongowe n'umushikiranganji w'ico gihugu ajejwe kwivuna abansi ziri mu rugendo mu gihugu c'Uburundi, nk'uko umuvugizi wa prezida w'Uburundi abivuga. Maj Gen Albert Murasira n'abo bagendanye kuri uyu wa Kabiri bakiriwe n'umukuru w'Uburundi Evariste Ndayishimiye i Gitega, umurwa mukuru. Mw'itangazo rigufi cane umubonano urangiye, Evelyne Butoyi, umuvugizi wa prezida Evariste Ndayishimiye, yabwiye abemenyeshamakuru ko izo ntumwa zari zizanye ubutumwa prezida w'Urwanda Paul Kagame arungikiye mugenziwe w'Uburundi. Kuva prezida Evariste Ndayishimiye ashitse ku butegetsi mu 2020, hari utwigoro tw'uko Uburundi n'Urwanda bisubira kugira imigenderanire nmyiza inyuma yo gutituka cane kuva mu 2015. Mw'itangazo rigufi cane umubonano urangiye , Evelyne Butoyi , umuvugizi wa prezida Evariste Ndayishimiye, yabwiye abemenyeshamakuru ko izo ntumwa zari zizaniye ubutumwa bwa prezida w'Urwanda Paul Kagame arungikiye mugenziwe w'Uburundi. Si ubwa mbere intumwa z'Urwanda zigendeye Uburundi. Mu kwezi kw'indwi mu mwaka uheze, umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Urwanda, Edouard Ngirente niwe yaserukiye Urwanda  mu kwifatanya n'abarundi mu guhimbaza imyaka 59 yari iheze igihugu cabo kironse intahe yo kwikukira. 'Ihwa ritarashinguka' N'Uburundi bumaze kurungika akatari gake intumwa mu Rwanda. Mu minsi hariyo izirongowe n'umushikiranganji w'Uburundi ajejwe  ubutungane. Rwanda - Burundi: Ba minisitiri b'ubutabera bahuriye i Kigali "Ni nk'igitangaza abarundi babonye" - Evariste Ndayishimiye Imbere yiwe hari hagiyeyo izirongowe n'umushikiranganji w'Uburundi ajejwe ishirahamwe ry'ibihugu vya Afrika y'Ubuseruko, ECA,  zakirwa n'umukuru w'igihugu c'Urwanda, Paul Kagame. Ariko gushika ubu reta y'Uburundi iguma ivuga ko hakiri ikitarakorwa kugira imigederanire hagati y'ivyo bihugu imere neza uko vyahora. Reta y'Uburundi isaba reta y'Urwada kuyirungikira abo irondera bahungiye hakurya y'Akanyaru  inyuma y'uruhara boba baragize mu kugeregeza gutembagaza ubutegetsi mu kwezi kwa gatanu mu 2015. Zaba iz'Urwanda zigendera Uburundi, canke iz'Uburundi zigendera Urwanda, nta ntumwa na zimwe ziremeza ko iryo hwa risigaye muri iyo migenderanire rigiye gushinguka. Inyuma y'umubonano na prezida Evariste Ndayishimiye  muri uru rundi rugendo rw'intumwa z'Urwanda mu Burundi, umuvugizi w'umukuru  w'igihugu , Evelyne Butoyi, yavuze ko izo ntumwa zaganiriye   "ibijanye n'imigenderanire hagati y'ivyo bihugu uko ari bibiri". Yongeyeko ati: "Murazi ko ivyo bihugu vyompi uko ari bibiri biriko birakora kugira imigenderanire isubire kugenda neza, ku neza y'Abarundi n'Abanyarwanda, ku neza y'ibihugu vyacu uko ari bibiri."

column2: Papa asaba ko haboneka inyishu "ruhasha" ku bihe mu butumwa kuri BBC yonyene
column3: Mu butumwa bw'ijwi yahaye BBC yonyene, Papa François asaba abategetsi b'isi bazohurira  ku ndwi iza mu nama ya ONU  ku bihe i Glasgow (muri Ecosse), gutanga "inyishu ziri n'ico zishikako" ku vyihutirwa ku bidukikije no guha "icizere gifadika" abariko bararuka. Muri ubwo butumwa bwafatiwe amajwi i Vaticano  bugahabwa ikiganiro Thought for the Day ca Radio 4 ya BBC, Papa yagarutse ku bihanze isi birimwo ikiza ca Covid -19, ihindagurika ry'ibihe hamwe n'ibibazo vy'ubutunzi, aca asaba abarongoye isi kubitorera inyishu mu buryo bw'icerekezo n'ingingo ruhasha , kugira "amahirwe" atangwa n'ivyo bihanze isi "ntatakare". Umwungere wa Ekereziya Katorika yavuze ati: "Duhangana n'ivyo vyugarije isi mu nzira za  nyamwigendako, kwigumizako ivyacu no gukoresha ivy'abandi, canke tukabibonamwo amahirwe nyayo y'impinduka". Yagarutse ku kuba hakenewe "ugusubira kwumva uruhara dusangiye rwo kwitaho isi yacu", yongerako ati "umwe wese muri twebwe - uwo ari we wese n'aho ari hose - ashobora kugira  ico aterereye mu guhindura inyishu ya twese ku ngeramizi zitari bwigere ziboneka  kw'ihindagurika ry'ibihe n'itituka ry'inzu dusangiye." Papa mu mwanya uza aja kubonana na prezida wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika Joe Biden. Imigambi ya Biden ku bijanye n'ibihe mu gihugu iwe iracari mu mayira abiri inyuma y'aho umugambwe wiwe wigirije inyuma gutora itegeko rigenda  integuro z'amafaranga yo gukoresha. Ubwo butumwa n'ubwibutsa ingene Papa François yashize imbere ibijanye no gukingira ibidukikije mu burongozi bwiwe bwa Ekereziya. Mu majambo ashikiriza, aramaze kugaruka kenshi ku kaga k'ibihe, mu 2015 akaba yasohoye ikete rya  Papa (enciclyque), ryitwa  Laudato Si' rishimikiye kuri ico kibazo. Muri iyo nyandiko inyito yayo yahinduwe mu zindi ndimi nka "Ku kwitaho inzu dusangiye" , yiyamirije ugusambura ibidukikije, yerekana ko hakenewe ingingo zofasha  kugabanya iryo hindagurika, aca yemeza ata guca hirya no hino ko ihindagurika ry'ibihe ahanini riterwa n'ibikorwa vy'umuntu. Iryo kete ryasohotse imbere y'uko haba inama ya ONU y'i Paris mu 2015, COP21, rikaba ryabonywe nk'iryagize ico rifashije mu gutuma abategetsi bashika ku masezerano. Inyuma y'imyaka itandatu, abategetsi b'isi bariko baritegurira gukoranira i Glasgow mu nama y'uyu mwaka, COP26. Mu gihe biguma bigaragara ko ivyiyemejwe i Paris bitariko birashikwako kugira  ukwiyongera kw'ubushuhe bw'isi ntikurenge 1.5C, ugereranije n'urugero rw'imbere y'uko hatagura amahinguriro,  Papa François yasubiye gushimika kuri ico kibazo  yizigiye ko ijambo ryiwe rizosubira kugira ico rifashije nka mbere.

column2: Vincent Kompany ariko arondera abakinyi muri TP Mazembe ya Kongo
column3: Umumenyereza mushasha w'umurwi wa Anderlecht, Vincent Kompany, ariko arondera abakinyi muri Kongo mu twigoro two gusubira gukomeza uwo murwi wo mu Bubirigi. Anderlecht ntiyashoboye kuronka uburenganzira bw'uguhiganirwa ibikombe ku rwego rw'umugabane wa Bulaya mu mwaka uza w'inkino. Uyu murwi witeguye kugura abakinyi Meschak Elia na Arsene Zola basanzwe bakina muri TP Mazembe muri Kongo. TP Mazembe iremeza igurishwa ry'abo bakinyi, ariko nta nsiguro itanga. Eka n'umurwi Anderlecht ntaco uratangaza. Umukinyi Elia w'imyaka 22 asanzwe akina ku ruhande, yaheruka kuja kwimenyereza mu murwi Standard Liege, yaranageragejwe mu murwi Bursaspor wo muri Turukiya, ariko bikaba bitagenze neza. Asanzwe ari i Cairo mu Misiri mu murwi nserukiragihugu wa Kongo uri mw'ihiganwa ry'igikombe ca Afrika (CAN 2019), witeze gukina na Madagascar mu gice c'umunani gishira ica nyuma. Bitegekanijwe ko azova i Cairo agenda i Buruseli mu Bubirigi, ivya Kongo muri iryo higanwa birangiye. Arsene Zola wewe yitezwe i Buruseli ejo ku munsi wa gatandatu nk'uko bitangazwa n'ibinyamakuru vy'Ububirigi. Zola yavutse ku wa 23 z'ukwa kabiri 1996 nk'uko vyerekanwa ku rubuga ngurukanabumenyi rw'umurwi TP Mazembe. Haciye imyaka itatu atanguye gukina, akaba yarerekanye ubuhinga bukomeye igihe umurwi TP Mazembe watsindira igikombe c'imirwi yabaye iya mbere muri Afrika mu mwaka wa 2017. Sibwo bwa mbere umurwi TP Mazembe ugurisha abakinyi mu gihugu c'Ububirigi. Mu kwa mbere kwa 2017, waragurishije abakinyi Merveille Bokadi, Jonathan Bolingi na Christian Luyinduma mu murwi Standard Liege. Hari haciye imyaka indwi umurwi Anderlecht uguze abakinyi Patou Kabangu na Bedi Mbenza bompi ibakuye muri TP Mazembe nyene, ariko bikaba bitabagendeye neza.

column2: Ethiopia: Ibitaro vyo muri Tigray vyaheranywe n'indya z'abana bishwe n'inzara
column3: Surafeal Mearig w'amezi atatu aryamye  mu bitaro  vya mbere binini mu ntara ya  Tigray yo muri Ethiopia yugarijwe. Amaso yiwe aruguruye cane, imbavu ziwe nazo zisa n'iziri hejuru kubera kwonda cane. Uwo n'umwe mu bana benshi barwaye indwara zo gufungura nabi kubera iyo ntambara mu yo muri Ethiopia imaze amezi 14 ubu yatandukiriye intara bihana urubibe za Afar na Amhara. Umuganga w'abana avura Surafeal mu bitaro  bikuru vya Ayder ku mugwa mukuru wa Tigray, Mekelle, yabwiye itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters ko apima 2,3kg, ikiro kimwe munsi y'ivyo yavukanye. Kugabisha:  Bamwe mu basomyi bashobora kubabazwa n'ifoto iri aho munsi. Ku bw'amakuru yo kwa muganga atangwa n'abakozi bo mu bitaro, amaberebere (amashereka)  ya nyina yarakamye nabo abavyeyi biwe, ubu ata n'umwe akora, ntibashobora kumugurira amata y'ifu. Na cane cane, abakozi bo ku bitaro bavuga ko ubu bariko barahererwa n'ivyo kurya bifasha mu  kuvura abana nka Surafeal. Umwe mu baganga yabwiye BBC ariko asaba kutamenyekana kuko umuryango wiwe wohava ugira ingorane  ati: "Ubu haciye amezi atandatu ata miti canke ibikoresho turonka biva i Addis Ababa (umurwa mukuru w'igihugu). Yongerako ati: "Dusa n'abahejeje ivyo twari dufise kuva turonse ivya nyuma mu kwezi kwa gatandatu. Ibintu vyose vyaheze". Muri iyi ndwi abakozi bo mu bitaro vya Ayder barashikirije icegeranyo amashirahamwe mpuzamakungu afasha basaba gufashwa. Surafeal yabaye umwe mu bana barekanywe. Abakozi bo mu bitaro bavuze ko 40% b'abana bafise munsi y'imyaka itanu bazanwa ku bitaro barwaye kubera ukurya nabi- ni incuro zibiri urugero rwo mu 2019. Medhaniye  w'imyaka ine asigaye ku magufa gusa, nawe nyene aryamye mu gitanda co kwa muganga, umuringoti umugaburira ucometse mu zuru . Icegeranyo ciwe co kwa muganga cerekana ko yatanguye kurwara kubera kurya nabi kuva aho abasirikare batereye urugo rwabo bakica  inka zabo, bagasambura bakongera bagasahura ivyo bari batunze. BBC ntishobora guhinyuza mu buryo bwigenga ibiri  muri ico cegeranyo ca muganga vyose kuko Tigray isanzwe yarugariwe uburyo bwo gutumatumanako kuva mu kwezi kwa 11, 2020 igihe intambara yaduka hagati ya Tigray People's Liberation Front (TPLF), isanzwe igenzura igice kini c'iyo ntara, na reta mpuzantara. Abanyamakuru nabo ntibemerewe gushika muri Tigray kuva mu kwezi kw'indwi. Guhagarika kuva amaraso n'ibiganza bigaragara Mu cegeranyo cabo abaganga bavuga ko iyugaranwa rimaze amezi atandatu ryagizwe n'ingabo za reta mpuzantara n'abazifasha urugamba ariryo rituma habura imiti n'ibikoresho vyo kwa muganga bavuga ko bituma hari abapfa kandi batopfuye. Icegeranyo kivuga ko "kuva intara yugarijwe, abandi barwayi 35 batakaje ubuzima kubera dialyse itagikora." Abanganga bavuga ko hari igihe biba ngombwa ko bahagarika ukuva kw'amaraso n'intoke zigaragara, bakamesa kugira basubire  gukoresha udufuka-ntoke canke bakikorera bonyene imiti yo kwica imicafu. Agira ico avuze kuri ivyo, umuvugizi wa reta Legesse Tulu  yabwiye BBC ko ico cegeranyo "kirondera kuvugira " TPLF  kandi  cigana ivyo ivuga ko Tigray yugaranywe. Yavuze ati : "Ku ruhande rwa reta, nta yugaranwa ry'ibigirankana rigirirwa Tigray  ngo ribangamire abanyagihugu bacu". Ariko kuva intanbara itanguye, amashirahamwe afasha yagumye yidoga ko ata mfashanyo nyinshi  ashobora gushikana muri Tigray. Ku bw'icegeranyo c'urwego rwa ONU ruhuza ibikorwa vyo gufasha abari mu kaga (Ocha) co  ku wa 30 ukwezi kwa 12,  imiduga itwaye imfashanyo muri Tigray ntirashobora kwinjira muri iyo ntara kuva hagati muri uko kwezi kubera amananiza y'intwaro n'umutekano muke. Ishami rya ONU ryitaho imfungurwa PAM/WFP rigeraranya ko amakamyo 100 atwaye imfashanyo akeneye gushika muri Tigray buri ndwi kugira hafashwe abantu barenga imiriyoni zitanu, ariko ku bwa Ocha, 12% vy'ibikenewe nivyo vyonyene bimaze gushika muri iyo ntara. Kuri ico kibazo co  kujana imfashanyo, Legesse yavuze ati: "Imiduga irenga 840 ku 1.100 itanga imiti n'ivyo kurya ntirasubizwa, ikekwa kuba ikoreshwa na TPLF mu gutwara abo yinjiza mu ngabo mu buryo bunyuranye n'amategeko, abasirikare hamwe n'ibikoresho vya gisirikare." TPLF irahakana ibivugwa ko ibangamira imfashanyo, ariko nayo nyene ingabo zayo ziramaze kwagirizwa ko zisahura ububiko bw'imfashanyo n'amavuriro mu turere zigenzura muri Amhara na Afar. Uyo muganga wo mu bitaro vya Ayder yabwiye BBC ko n'imiryango y'abakozi nayo nyene ikorwako n'ico kibazo. Yavuze ati: "Umwana wanje arwaye appendicite kandi ntashobora kuronka ingene avurwa". Kandi mu gihe imiti n'ibikoresho bibandanya gukena, avuga ko ata kundi bazogira, impera n'imperuka bazotegerezwa guhagarika ibikorwa vyo kubaga vyose kuva ku ndwi iza. "Nta bikoresho n'imiti turonka. Aho niho tugeze, ari naco gituma twashaka isi ibimenye. Ibitaro vyinshi bigiye kwugara."

column2: Sport: Abakuru b'imigwi y'inkino bifatanije n'abo mu mupira w'amaguru mu kwinuba imbuga hwaniro imisi 4
column3: Imigwi ikomakomeye y'umupira w'amaguru n'abakinyi bagiye kwifatanya n'inzego zirongoye inkino mu kwinuba imbuga hwaniro mu kiringo c'imisi ine kuva ku musi wa gatanu mu ntumbero yo kugwanya ifatwa nabi n'amacakubiri. "Uko gushigikirana mu kugwanya amajambo mabi aca ku mbuga hwaniro" gufise intumbero yo gutera intege izo mbuga mu gufata ingingo ruhasha ku banyamacakubiri afatiye ku rukoba no ku gitsina. Amashirahamwe ya Rugby na Cricket baraza gushigikira abo mu mupira w'amaguru muri urwo rugamba. Uko kwinuba izo mbuga kwaniro biza gutangura isaha isaha 17:00 ku musi wa gatanu gushika isaha 1:59 ku masaha yo mu Rwanda no mu Burundi. Umukuru w'ishirahamwe Kick it Out, rigwanya amacakubiri afatiye ku rukoba, Sanjay Bhandaru yavuze ati:"Uku kwinuba vyerekana agashavu kacu twese. "Mu kwinuba imbuga hwaniro, twerekanye ikimeyetso kura abo babifitiye ububasha. Dushaka ko mufata ingingo. Dushaka mufashe guhindura ibintu." Abafashe ingingo yo kwinuba Twitter, Facebook na Instagram ni: Imigwi yo mu Bwongereza y'abasiganwa ku makinga, abasiganwa ku ndogobwe, Hockey hamwe n'ishirahamwe rya Tennis na bo bari mu bitavye ako kamo. Umukinyi wa mbere kw'isi mu gusiganwa n'imodoka Lewis Hamilton co kimwe n'umudereva George Russell na bo bari mu bagiye kwinuba imbuga hwaniro muri ico kiringo c'imisi ine.

column2: Brexit: Boris Johnson arashima amasezerano y'ubudandaji hagati ya UK na EU
column3: Ishirahamwe ry'ubumwe bwa Buraya, EU, n'Ubwongereza bashitse ku masezerano azogenga ubudandaji inyuma ya Brexit, aje kurangiza amezi yo kutumvikana ku burenganzira bwo kuroba n'amategeko agenga ubudandaji. Mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru ku biro iwe, Boris Johnson yagize ati:"Twasubiranye ubwigenge ku mategeko yaco hamwe na kazoza kacu." Umushikiranganji wa mbere yongeyeko ko, n'aho ibiganiro "vyari bigoye" ari "amasezerano meza ku Buraya bwose" azotanga akazi n'iterambere. Umukuru w'ishirahamwe rya Buraya Ursula Von der Leyen yavuze ko ari amasezerano "ata ho yegamiye". Mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru I Bruxelles, umukuru w'akanama k'ubumwe bwa Buraya yavuze ati:"Rwari urugendo rurerure rurimwo ibihuhusi ariko twaronse amasezerano meza twerekana. "Ni nyayo, nta ho yegamiye, kandi n'ikintu ciza cari gikwiriye gukorwa ku mpande zose." Yongeyeko ko ubu ari "igihe co kwibagira kahise tukaraba muri kazoza" kandi ko Ubwongereza "buguma ari ncuti nyakuri". Yavuze ko hazoba ikiringo mfatakibanza c'imyaka itanu n'igice mu bakora mu gisata c'uburovyi. Hanyuma imigenderanire izobandanya ku bibazo bijanye n'ihindukagurika ry'ibihe, amasoko ntanganguvu, umutekano hamwe no mu gutwara abantu n'ibintu. Mw'itangazo, ibiro vy'umushikiranganji wa mbere mu Bwongereza bigira biti:"Turagarukanye amahera yacu, imbibe, amategeko, ubudandaji hamwe n'amazi turobamwo," Risubiramwo icivugo ca Johnson co kwiyamamaza mu matora, ryongeyeko  "Brexit iragiye mu bikorwa". Johnson yashize kuri Twitter ifoto yiwe ariko aramwenyura, yashize intoke z'ibikumu hejuru. Mu kiganiro yatanze, yavuze:"Turarangije amasezerano akomeye aciye imiriyaridi 668 y'amapawundi ku mwaka. "Amasezerano yumvikana ameze nk'aya Canada hagati y'Ubwongereza na EU. Amasezerano azokingira ubuzi muri iki  gihugu cose, azotuma ibidandazwa vyo mu Bwongereza bigurishwa ata makori, ata n'ibice bitanzwe kw'isoko rya Buraya. "Amasezerano azoha uburenganzira amakompanyi gukorana n'ibihugu vy'incuti vy'i Buraya."

column2: Bujumbura: Abatwara moto, tuk-tuk n'amakinga bongewe iminsi
column3: Abakora akazi ko kwunguruza abantu kuri moto, amakinga canke tuk-tuk mu gisagara ca Bujumbura mu Burundi bongewe ikiringo mu gihe itegeko ribabuza kuja mu bice bimwe vy'umuji ryagomba kuja mungiro kuri uyu wa 11 ukwezi kwa gatatu. Abajejwe intwaro mu Burundi bari batanze itariki yo gushika  kuri uyu wa gatanu ngo abanyonga ivyo vyuma ntibasubire kubicisha mu gice kinini c'umuji wa Bujumbura. Kiretse abanyonga ivyo vyuma babicisha amafaranga,  iryo tegeko ryaraba n'amakinga na moto vy'abiyunguruza ku giti cabo kiretse gusa moto ziriko imparati za leta. Ariko mu butumwa bwagaragaye ku rubuga twitter  ku wa kane ku muguroba, Mairie ya Bujumbura yatangaje  y'uko abatwara ivyo vyuma bahawe igihe c'ukudohorerwa. Ico gihe bahawe ni ico gushika itariki 21 Ntwarane (ukwa gatatu), ico kiringo ngo "kikazokoreshwa mu kwandika abatwara ivyo vyuma". Ubwo butumwa bwo kuri twitter kandi bunavuga yuko hafashwe ingingo yo kwugurura vya vyumba vyo kwiyubikira canke kwiyuka bita sauna hamwe n'umuziki w'ikibiriraho uzwi nka karaoke ngo kuko "ikiza ca Covi-19 cagabanutse bimwe biboneka." Mu gufata ingingo yo kubuza ivyo vyuma gushika mu gice kinini c'igisagara ca Bujumbura, ubushikiranganji bujejwe umutekano bwavuga ko ari ingingo yo kurinda umutekano w'abakoresha amabarabara bose. Ariko abo batwara ivyo vyuma bakavuga yuko ubuzima bugiye kugorana cane kuri bo, co kimwe no ku bavyikorako bibashikana hirya no hino mu gisagara mu buryo bworoshe. Kuva leta itangaje ko iyo ngingo izoja mu ngiro itariki 11/03/2022, hari haheze iminsi haba amanama yo gusigurira abo ingingo igiye gukorako igituma yafashwe n'akamaro kayo. Ariko bobo bavuga yuko abafahe iyo ngingo bari kubanza kubibamenyesha imbere yuko ifatwa bakagira ico bayivuzeko. Jado Nzitunga, umuyobozi w'ishirahamwe ry'abagendesha moto zunguruza abantu mu gisagara ca Bujumbura yabwiye BBC ko batagishijwe inama. Yagize ati: "Igihe iyo 'equipe technique' yabikora, yaba twebwe dusanzwe turongoye amashirahamwe, yaba abasanzwe biyunguruza kuri ayo mapikipiki, yaba abagendesha ayo mapikipiki n'ayo mabajaji, nta n'umwe bigeze barondera   kugira bicare hamwe barabe iyo ngingo, iciza canke ingaruka zayo". Ariko mu bushikiranganji bujejwe umutekano, bo bafashe iyo ngingo, bavuga yuko leta mu gufata icemezo kiraba ineza y'abanyagihugu iba yavyize neza. Umuvugizi w'igipolisi gikorera muri ubwo bushikiranganji, Désiré Nduwimana, yagize ati: "Ubutegetsi iyo bubona yuko hariho ikiriko kirononekara, mu kuramira abenegihugu ntubanza kubabaza ati mbega bigende gute. "Ugomba kugirira umutekano abantu ubakorera ibikenewe ntubanza kubagisha inama." Désiré Nduwimana abandaniya avuga yuko amasanganya mu mabarabara ya Bujumbura yari amaze kuba umurengera, kandi ko ivyo vyuma vy'amakinga, moto na bajaji canke tuk-tuk bibifisemwo uruhara runini. Hagati aho, abagendesha ivyo vyuma bagiye gukorwako n'iyi ngingo bavuga yuko amasanganya adatezwa gusa nabo, ko hari ikibazo c'amabarabara atameze neza hamwe n'ivyapa bibuze canke bitakigaragara neza. Uyu mukuru w'ishirahamwe ry'abagendesha amapikipiki yunguruza abantu i Bujumbura avuga yuko ingaruka zigiye kuba nyishi cane. Jado Nzitunga yagize ati: "... mw'ishirahame ryacu ngaha i Bujumbura hari amamoto ari hagati y'ibihumbi bine n'ibihumbi bitanu, urumva ayo yari asanzwe atunze imiryango. "Ugasanga hari n'igihombo kizoba kuri aba basanzwe bafise amazu y'ama restaurant hamwe bafungurira, ndetse n'abo bantu bose bahora bayikorako bafise amikoro make bizobagora." Ku mbuga hwaniro haragaragaye amasanamu y'abatanguye kujana mu yindi mihingo y'igihugu ivyo vyuma vyabo, mu gutinya ko babibaka ingingo niyamara kuja mu ngiro. Kwiyunguruza na moto, ikinga canke tuk-tuk vyari bimaze  kumenyerwa cane, kandi naho koko ayo masanganya aba, benshi bashima ivyo vyuma kubera ukuzimbuka hamwe no gushika aho baja banyarutse kurusha imiduga.

column2: Tanzania-Covid : Prezida mushasha wa Tanzania asabwa na OMS kurwanya coronavirus
column3: Umukuru w'ishami rya ONU riraba amagara kw'isi OMS/WHO, umunye Ethiopia Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, yarungitse ubutumwa bwo gukeza umukuru  mushasha wa Tanzania, avuga ko yizeye ko bazokorana mu kurwanya  umugera wa Covid-19. Umukuru wa OMS yanditse kuri Twitter ati: "Niteze ko tugiye gukorana kugira dukingire abantu indwara ya Covid-19, turangize ikiza hanyuma Tanzania kibe igihugu c'amagara meza gusumba. Dufashanije." Samia Suluhu Hassan kuri uyu wa gatanu ni ho yarahirira amabanga yo kuba umukuru w'igihugu mushasha wa Tanzania - iminsi ibiri inyuma y'urupfu rwa prezida John Pombe Magufuli. Uwo muhisi yaramenyekanye cane mu makungu muri uyu mwaka uheze ku buryo yitwaye ku kibazo ca coronavirus. Tanzania ntirasubira gutangaza ku mugaragaro amakuru yerekeye ico kiza kuva mu kwezi kwa gatanu mu mwaka uheze, kandi reta yaranse kurondera incanco n'ubwo OMS yagumye isaba ko abanyeTanzania bakingirwa. Ahubwo prezida Magufuli yahamagarira abanyagihugu gusenga no kwiyuka kugira bikingire uwo mugera. Magufuli yarakekeza kandi akamaro k'udufukamunwa, ikintu umwanditsi w'umuganda Charles Onyango-Obbo yavuze kuri Twitter ko kitaciye mu ryahumye Gado mu gicapo ciwe ca politike ca nyuma. Uwo munye Tanzania aba muri Kenya, Godfrey Mwampembwa  azwi cane kw'izina rya  Gado, yandika ibineguro yishimikije ibicapo  (Caricaturiste /cartoonist)   yerekana Magufuli, umukatolika yabigendera, ari ku bw'injiriro bw'ijuru yakiriwe n'umumarayika amubwira ati: "Nagira ndakumenyeshe ko udashobora kwinjira utambaye agafukamunwa!" Havuzwe vyinshi ku magara ya Magufuli imbere y'uko apfa ku wa gatatu, urupfu vyavuzwe ko rwatewe n'ukwunyuka kw'ikibazo c'umutima yari asanganywe. Yari amaze indwi zirenga zibiri ataboneka ahagaragara, abatavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi bakaba bavuze ko yari agwaye Covid-19.

column2: Tanzania-Dr Philip Mpango:Video y'umushikiranganji abeshuza ko yapfuye yaneguwe cane
column3: Video ibabaje y'umushikiranganji  wa Tanzania ajejwe ikigega ari imbere y'abamenyeshamakuru kubeshuza ibihuha vy'uko yapfuye yaneguwe cane, benshi bakavuga ko bitari bikenewe kandi  ari ukumugirira nabi. Ku ndwi iheze prezida John Magufuli yari yebeshuje ivyo bihuha , avuga ko Dr Philip Mpango akiriho kandi ariko aratora mitende. Ku wa kabiri, Dr Mpango, ahagatiwe n'abakozi bo kwa muganga babiri , batambaye udufukamunwa, yasomye itangazo imbere y'abamenyeshamakuru mu bitaro vyitiriwe Benjamin Mkapa ku murwa mukuru Dodoma. Yarakoroye   aranahagirika kenshi  kugira abashe gusubira guhema neza igihe yariko arasoma iryo tangazo. Ntibizwi indwara agwaye iyariyo ariko yavuze ko yari afise "ingorane zo guhema" kandi ko yari akeneye  umwuka(oxygene). Yavuze kandi ko yakize. Uwutavuga rumwe n'ubutegetsi Tundu Lisu yaneguye abategetsi baretse ngo iryo tangazo rigenewe abamenyeshamakuru risomwe. Ati: "Ninde yaretse umuntu arwaye ngo akore ivyo, yarakorora kandi ntiyari yambaye agafukamunwa. Yategerzwa kuba ariko araruhuka  anavurwa.'' Lissu yongeyeko ati uko "n'ukwigira sindabibazwa'' Dr Mpango yageze ahantu ikigumbagumba kiramufata igihe yariko arahoza ababuze yongera asaba imbabazi ko atashoboye  imigirwa yo gusezera icegera ca mbere c'umukuru wa Zanzibar Sef Sharif Hamad, yapfuye ku ndwi iheze ahitanywe na Covid-19,n'umunyamabanga mukuru mu biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu John Kijazi n'uwahoze ari umukuru wa banki nkuru y'igihugu Prof Benno Ndulu. Dr Mpango ati: "Narababaye kubona  ata n'umwe nashoboye guherekeza ariko ndabifuriza amahoro adashira." Hamaze kuvugwa impfu nyinshi zifatiye kuri Covid-19 muri Tanzania ariko ntizigeze zemezwa icese canke naho vyavuzwe ko umugera wa corona atari wo waziteye. Ariko ubu Tanzania  ubu bwa vuba yarahinduye imvugo, ubu abategetsi ntibakivuga koi co gihugu ata Covid-19 ikirangwamwo ahubwo bagahamiriza abanyagihugu kwubahiriza amategeko yo kwikingira harimwo kwambara agafukamunwa.

column2: Ghana: Abashingamateka barwanye bapfa ikori ku mahera aca ku materefone ngendanwa
column3: Hadutse imishamirano mu nama nshingamateka ya Ghana mw'ijoro ryo kuwa mbere buca ari ku wa kabiri igihe abashingamateka bariko biga ikori ryotangwa ku mafaranga acishwa ku materefone ngendanwa. Abashingamateka barateranye inkokora, barasunagurana, bahana amangumi, mu gihe abandi nabo bagerageza kubanguranya. Iyi mishamirano yadutse igihe abashingamateka bo ku ruhande rutavuga rumwe n'umugambwe uri ku butegetsi bahaguruka bakaja kubuza icegera c'umukuru w'inama nshingamateka Joseph Osei Owusu ko ahaguruka ngo aje gutora, nk'uko bivugwa n'ibinyamakuru vyo muri ico gihugu. Niwe yari arongoye ino nama yahavuye yunguruzwa kubera uru ruhagarara. Umugambwe National Democratic Congress (NDC) utavuga rumwe n'uwuri ku butegetsi uriyamiriza iri kori ringana na 1.75% ku mafaranga acishwa ku materefone ngendanwa, harimwo no kuriha ibicuruzwa ukoresheje terefone ngendanwa. Uyu mugambwe uvuga ko iri kori rizohohotera abadafise amikoro manini hamwe n'abo bose bari hanze y'igisata c'amabanki. Ariko umushikiranganji w'ikigega ca reta Ken Ofori-Artta avuga ko ari ukwagura igisata c'abatangakori, agasigura ko mu mwaka uza igihugu gishobora kuhungukira imiriyaridi 6.9 z'amafaranga y'ama cedi akoreshwa muri Ghana (yababa hafi imiriyaridi 1.15 y'amadorari y'abanyamerika). Iri koraniro ry'inama nshingamateka ryatanguye ku wa mbere mu gatondo, rikaba ryagiye guhagarikwa inyuma y'isaha zitandatu z'ijoro (canke saa sita z'ijoro), nk'uko bivugwa n'ikinyamakuru Graphic co muri ico gihugu. Iki kinyamakuru cacishije ku rubuga rwa Twitter iyi reresi y'uru ruhagarara. BBC ntibazwa ibivuye ku zindi mbuga. Abanya-Ghana batari bake bagaye iyi nyifato y'abashingamateka babo, bakavuga ko bategerezwa kubera akarorero keza abandi - hakwifata nk'abana. Ijwi ry'icegera c'umukuru w'inama nshingamateka ryaboneka ko ari kirumara mu gihe inama nshingamateka yacanyemwo bikomeye kubera integuro y'iri kori. Ava mu mugambwe uri ku butegetsi New Patriotic Party (NPP). Umugambwe NDC uvuga ko atategerezwa gutora kubera yari arongoye inama. Ikinyamakuru Graphic kivuga ko integuro y'tegeko rigenga iri kori yemejwe n'umurwi w'inama nshingamateka ujejwe ikigega, ku majwi 13 kuri 12, ariko ni inyuma y'aho umukuru w'uyu murwi atangiye ijwi ryiwe ryabanguranije. Inama nshingamateka yasubiye gukorana kandi ejo ku wa kabiri, ariko abashingamateka ntibatoye iri tegeko inyuma y'aho bumvikaniye ko inama yungururizwa mu kwa mbere. Poritike ya Ghana irangwamwo ukutumvikana kuva mu mwaka uheze, inyuma y'amatora aho imigambwe NDC na NPP yaronse intebe 137 umwe umwe. Intebe imwe ni iy'uwigenga, yagiye ku ruhande rwa NPP, agatuma uwu mugambwe uronka akarusho. Mu kwa mbere, abasirikare barinjiye mu nama nshingamateka kugira bahagarike imishamirano hagati y'abashingamateka yadutse bagomba gutora umukuru w'inama nshingamateka. Ico gihe, Alban Bagbin wa NDC niwe yatowe inyuma y'aho bamwe mu bashingamateka ba NPP bamuhereye amajwi bakayima uwo mu mugambwe wabo, Mike Oquaye. Bagbin ntiyari muri iyi nama yo kuwa mbere yadutsemwo uru ruhagarara, ari co gituma yaciye irongorwa na Owusu wo muri NPP.

column2: Antonio Guterres wa ONU yemeye gushigikira igisirikare ca DR Congo
column3: Umunyamabanga mukuru w'ishirahamwe ONU yemeye ko iryo shirahamwe rizobandanya gufasha igisirikare ca Repubulika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Congo mu ntambara yo kurwanya imirwi irwanya ubutegetsi. Mu rugendo rwiwe  ejo ku wa Mungu mu gisagara ca Beni kiri mu buseruko bw'ico gihugu, Antonio Guterres yamenyesheje ko ari nkenerwa ko ibitero vy'ukurwanya imirwi irwanya ubutegetsi bibandanya. Inteko mpuzamakungu zigera ku 16,000 ziri muri ico gihugu (MONUSCO), kikaba ari gitigiri kinini c'ingabo za ONU kw'isi. Amafaranga zikoresha ku mwaka arenga n'umuliyaridi w'amadolari. Bwana Guterres yemeye ko ingabo za ONU zizokorana n'igisirikare be n'igipolisi vya Congo. Umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC akorera muri ico gihugu avuga ko abanyagihugu bo mu karere k'ubuseruko bw'ico gihugu bidoga bavuga izo ngabo ataco zimaze. Izo ngabo zimaze imyaka irenga 20 muri ico gihugu, ariko ubukozi bw'ikibi burabandanya. Asubirwamwo n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru AFP, bwana Guterres avuga ati: "Tuzokora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo duhagarike uruhagarara". Umunyamabanga mukuru wa ONU yarashitse no mu karere ka Mangina aho ikiza ca Ebola catanguriye, haciye umwaka. Umutekano muke muri ako karere watumye igikorwa c'uguhangana n'umugera wa Ebola kibangamirwa, mu gihe ukutamenya kw'abanyagihugu ku vyerekeye uwo mugera kwatumye utwigoro tw'ukurwanya ikwiragira ryawo ataho dushika. Abashika 2000 baramaze guhitanwa n'iyo ndwara. Bwana Guterres yaragendeye ikigo kivura abafashwe n'iyo ndwara, aho yabahimirije ko abafashwe bokwihutira kwa muganga aho kwinyegeza.
